label: ham
subject: Re: discussion with the FSF: GPLv3, GFDL, Nexenta
body: 27 (return) [ The truth of geography, and the original text of Villehardouin, (No. 194,) place Rodosto three days’ journey (trois jornées) from Adrianople: but Vigenere, in his version, has most absurdly substituted _trois heures_; and this error, which is not corrected by Ducange has entrapped several moderns, whose names I shall spare.]
